name: Maram Farrag
title: Senior Backend Engineer
about:
I lead the design and implementation of software systems that meet both functional and non-functional requirements. I collaborate with stakeholders, development teams, and other architects to create high-level and detailed designs, covering software components, interfaces, and data models. I also ensure adherence to architectural standards, identify and mitigate technical risks, and communicate project progress and challenges.

With 7 years of expertise in Node.js and Python, I have a proven track record of delivering end-to-end product development and driving business expansion. At Tactful AI, I successfully led the engineering team that launched the company's first product in the European market, increasing the user base by 35%. I also have experience in developing Customer Support Solutions, including ERP and CMS development and implementing automation. I am proficient in system architecture, microservices, and real-time solutions, using Apache Kafka and Sockets.

I am passionate about continuous learning and innovation, and I actively contribute to open-source projects and communities. I am also a Technical Consultant, providing guidance and support to various engineering functions and operations. My collaborative and results-driven approach enables me to work effectively with diverse teams and stakeholders, fostering cohesion and influencing team members for multiplied results. I am eager to embrace new challenges and contribute to diverse business markets with my skills and experience.

education.degree: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science - Software Engineering

experience.description: Led the engineering team to launch the company's first product in the European market, increasing the user base by 35%. Focused on Customer Support Solutions, ERP and CMS development, and implementing automation solutions.

projects.name: VR Driving
projects.description: A project to teach people how to drive using virtual reality and driving simulation to address traffic issues and enhance driving experience. Tools: C#, Unity, Blender, Samsung Gear VR.

projects.name: 3M Maps
projects.description: A social network application enabling users to share locations, rate places, and receive recommendations. Developed web and desktop platforms using Java EE, OpenShift, SQL, and Swing.

projects.name: Artificial Intelligence Applications
projects.description: Small games console applications using Python.

projects.name: Command Language Interpreter
projects.description: UNIX-like CLI for executing basic commands. Developed as part of OS course using Java.

projects.name: Compression Algorithms
projects.description: Implementation of Huffman Coding, Arithmetic Coding, and more as part of Multimedia course using Java.

projects.name: Gifty App
projects.description: Android mobile app to convert a group of images into a GIF.

projects.name: Meeting Organization Web Application
projects.description: Web app to find suitable meeting times for participants. Tools: JSP, Servlets, Java EE, AJAX, jQuery, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, MVC Design Pattern.

projects.name: Movie App (MAL Graduation Project)
projects.description: Android app displaying movies sorted by rating or popularity, with support for different layouts for mobile and tablets. Integrated IMDB API.
